title: Ultra Modern One Bedroom Condo
posting_body: Elegantly remodeled 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom condo of 682 sq.
ft. (per appraisal) with beautiful finishes throughout and attention to detail.
Modern features include engineered hardwood floors, ambient cove lighting, and an open floor plan that flows into an expansive private outdoor patio overlooking redwood trees.
The home boasts contemporary design, luxurious upgrades, and abundant natural light perfect for entertaining or relaxing amidst a serene backdrop.
Unit  is privately located in a quiet setting within a meticulously landscaped complex.
This home features spacious rooms, an updated bathroom with high-end vanity and fixtures, and plenty of storage.
The modern kitchen features updated appliances, a designer faucet, and granite countertops.
Additional amenities include in-unit Bosch washer/dryer, radiant heating, new paint, and custom built-in closet storage in the living area.
Residents will enjoy a designated garage parking space and a large storage unit.
